CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper, January 3, 1953, pg. 11, reads: "Leading Characters - Playing major roles in the Christmas cantata, 'Babe of Bethlehem,' at Park Place AME Church, Homestead....  The cantata was directed by Mrs. Catherine C. Gardner. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Seventeen women wearing costumes for "Babe of Bethlehem" Christmas cantata, first row from left: Elma Veney, Ethel Harris, Martha Henson, Dorothy Ford, unknown; second row: Julia West, Mozella Baker, Mary Black, Myrtle Wall, Catherine Cardwell Gardner, Laura Williams, Arlene Ford, Mary Bumry, Maggie, Theresa Harrison, Adelaide Montgomery, and Thena Croons, posed in Park Place AME Church, Homestead
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Homestead.Churches--Pennsylvania--Homestead.Park Place African Methodist Episcopal Church (Homestead, Pa.)Stained glass--Pennsylvania--Homestead.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Homestead.
